page.title: 14COUNTY YOUTH CLUB,UNSTONE.
page.content: Leader Michael Blake, age 47, resides Unstone. Club founded 1964. Formerly in Jnr Sch, transfer Community Centre 1983. Two evgs. Mon.& Fri. 7:00/9:30. Ages 12_18, av.attend 35 per night. Two-thirds boys. Subs. 20p per night. Monthly disco 75p. Hall rent Â£9 p.n. Own microwave oven,fridge,p.a system, table tennis, darts, pool table,colour TV & halogen lights outside. Members prepare own snacks, 20p hot-dogs, chip butties, coffee 10p, Coca-Cola 12p, crisps 10p. Monthly trip ice rink, Sheffield, annual trip Blackpool, Â£3:50. Party for pensioners Christmas. Oven stolen members 1984, recovered. Leader few illusions: "75% members smoke. Spitting, obscene language, vandalism, girls & boys. Difficult maintain discipline, standards. No gangs though. Behaviour probably due growing concern unemployment."
